text.text: Ouranosaurus, a large hadrosaurus from Cretaceous Niger and Cameroon. This large hardrosaurus would've grazed through the green swamps like in the ancient Elrha Formation. Nigersaurus was a sauropod Ouranosaurus would've found itself living with. It was discovered in a expiditon from 1965 to 1972, led by French palaeontologist Philippe Taquet.
Ouranosaurus was 7.2 meters from nose to tail. It would've found itself victem of the crocodyliformes and theropods in the formation.
